channel.title: My new site and forums
channel.description:
Hey guys I have been around for a very long time in runescape cheating communities that date to some of the most original fourms such as bovinelabs staying in the background learning and every now and then spaming the boards with badly typed posts and topics ( not really spam but very hard to understand tutorials and scripts and the some private server stuff ) but now im just posting that I have remade my crappy piece of the Internet [url=http://www.newguy45.com]www.newguy45.com[/url] in to a less crappy piece of the Internet ( although it is still pretty crappy ) but now my site is current and has a nice Simple Machines Forum like moparisthebest but a whole hella lot less massive I literally have like ... six or seven members so I'f you would like to check out a nice forum which should stay relatively small come check us out we talk alot about business and religion and politics ( the fun nontalkables ) and we have our downloads section and a graphics section. I'm pretty much hosting it and my friends site all by myself so if things seem slow bear with me. Come join us if you want to make some new friends and have a little fun, hope to see most of you there!
~newguy45~
P.S: www.newguy45.com is approved. click the forum button on the top :P

item.title: My new site and forums
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

I try to steer clear from lieing in general but lieing over online forums with talented people in particular has a nice way of coming back to bite you in the ass

thank you Zero. I have fixed all those mistakes, if anyone finds anymore I would greatly appreciate being notified of them

Read full topic

item.title: My new site and forums
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

-.- computers inc.

Adrian Smith, Chad Wall, and myself, Albert medders, are working around the clock to launch our corporation “-.- computers inc.” we are all still young and are finnsing our education in college and highschool. By are planing and calculating we will be into our “server building” stage of our business were we will be spening almost all of are income on upgradeing our servers to better service the you the customers

Although we are young and litterly have no experence in buissness we are all smart and have a great resolve to move forward to succeed, let us share that resolve with you.


you should, finnsi this are education, in college and highschool, properly has been, so you , litterly have more experence, in buissness and can planing and spening are calculating, the ,upgradeing of your servers with are income, to better service the you the customers.
MybJames:

I FOR ONE WILL DEFINITLY BE A REGULAR VISITOR TO THESE EQUISITE FORUMS. NOTHING IS BETTER THAN GETTING HOME AFTER A LONG HARD DAY, OPENING A PACK OF CHIPS AND VISITING THE NEWGUY FORUMS.

I lol’d

item.title: My new site and forums
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

I like your color scheme but you have the wrong idea, im not trying to make another runescape cheading forum although them may very well use my forum for it also I would not say my site would ever be better than mopar/silab. Also not trying to be a partypooper but make sure your links are from fery general sites or have them approved before you post them.

( I don’t know if your link is or is not )
